name: MKDistanceFormatter.Units
desc: Constants that reflect the type of units to use in the string.

items.name: case `default`
items.desc: The format uses the locale information to determine which units to use. Some locales mix metric and imperial units so do not assume this means one or the other.

items.name: case imperialWithYards
items.desc: The format uses imperial units that include measurements in yards.
